variable.name: ESP_VISIT_NUMBER
variable.description: ESP, visit number within each cohort (1-5)

variable.name: ESP_CURRENT_SMOKING_LONG
variable.description: ESP, current smoking status indicator (0/1) at each visit

variable.name: ESP_FEV1
variable.description: ESP, post-bronchodilator FEV1 at each available visit

variable.name: ESP_FVC
variable.description: ESP, post-bronchodilator FVC at each available visit
